title: D&C Article Release
description: Newspaper feature highlighting the scholarship story and its impact on students. The article will showcase past recipients and share the mission of the scholarship fund.

title: Annual Scholarship Awards Ceremony
description: Join us as we celebrate this year's scholarship recipients. The ceremony will recognize outstanding students and honor the legacy of Melissa & Jason.

title: Community Fundraiser Event
description: A community gathering to raise funds for next year's scholarships. The event will feature local speakers, student presentations, and opportunities to connect with the scholarship community.
